title: Digital World: Audio Compression
addDirTip: Will find all audio files in the selected folder and subfolders
taskThreadsNumberTip: The larger the number of task threads, the more CUP and memory it consumes. It is recommended to choose 1-3 for regular computers
bitRateTip1: The larger the bit rate, the larger the audio volume
bitRateTip2: If the original audio bit rate is less than the set bit rate, the original audio bit rate will be used
bitRateTip4: Bit rate must be an integer
delConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
